title: Eco-Friendly 5-Bedroom Duplex Oasis by the Ustka Port
description: Enjoy sustainable luxury in this spacious 5-bedroom, 2-bathroom duplex, designed for maximum comfort and efficiency. Spanning 180 sqm, this bright modern home boasts a welcoming open-plan living space with a cozy fireplace and provides flexible options for guest rooms or creative studios. With cutting-edge energy-efficient construction and an EV charging station, this home ensures eco-conscious living in serene surroundings. Residents have access to a lush shared courtyard and custom-built bicycle storage for extra convenience.
neighborhood_description: Located in Ustka’s emerging Port District, this tranquil neighborhood captures the essence of coastal living while remaining just minutes from the city center. Take advantage of well-developed bike lines that connect throughout Ustka, and effortlessly reach nearby destinations via highway access. The area is community-focused and ideal for those seeking a blend of peaceful living and engagement with friendly neighbors.
lifestyle_benefits: opportunity to garden and enjoy outdoor spaces
target_buyer: Perfect for retirees seeking modern comfort, eco-conscious features, and a peaceful environment close to nature and amenities in Ustka.
market_positioning: A rare eco-friendly duplex designed with retired buyers and green living in mind; offers more space and boutique touches than standard city-center apartments while remaining highly accessible to the heart of Ustka.
